channel.title: Art Flaneur - Exhibition Reviews
channel.description: Curated exhibition reviews and contemporary art insights from Art Flaneur

item.title: “Recipes for Broken Hearts”: How Bukhara Rethinks the Biennale Format
item.description: The first Bukhara Biennale, organised by Uzbekistan Art and Culture Development Foundation offers a fundamentally different approach to the biennial format: it proposes an intimate immersion into the living cultural fabric of the ancient Silk Road city.
item.author: info@artflaneur.com.au (Svetlana Astakhova)
